entry.title: 部署博客
entry.content: 这是一个简单的指导说明，介绍如何使用github和hexo大家一个自己的博客. Quick Start部署准备 本地安装git和nodejs 去github申请账号,并创建一个仓库(仓库名为账户名.github.io) 安装和配置hexo 安装hexo 1$ npm install -g hexo-cli 安装git部署工具 1$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 创建hexo的工程目录 1$ hexo init source.账户名.github.io 设置git部署仓库 123456$ cd source.账户名.github.io$ vim _config.yml$ deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/账户名/账户名.github.io.git branch: master 部署hexo 克隆仓库到本地 1$ git clone https://github.com/账户名/账户名.github.io.git 创建分支 123$ cd 账户名.github.io$ git checkout -b source$ git branch -a 移动hexo工程到仓库 1$ mv source.账户名.github.io/* 账户名.github.io 保存源码到仓库 123$ git add -A$ git commit -m "add source file"$ git push origin source 部署hexo 1$ hexo d 访问博客 1$ https://账户名.github.io 修改主题 下载主题放入themes目录下 修改_config.yml的theme为对应主题名 使主题生效 1234$ hexo clean$ hexo g$ hexo d$ hexo d More info: 优化主题

entry.title: Hexo参考文档
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
